title: Ultimate club sandwiches
ingredients: ['6 slices white bread', 'mayonnaise', 'handful lettuce', '1 ripe tomato, sliced', '2 hard boiled eggs, sliced', '4 slices bacon, grilled until crispy', 'salt and pepper', '2 slices Edam, Gruyere or Cheddar', '1/4 red onion, sliced', '1 cooked chicken breast, sliced', '8 decorative toothpicks']
